Package gate.creole.ontology.owlim

The low-level OWLIM API for ontologies in GATE.

Class Summary
AbstractOWLIMOntologyImpl This class provides implementation of most of the methods of Ontology interface.
AllValuesFromRestrictionImpl  
AnnotationPropertyImpl Provides an implementation of the AnnotationProperty interface.

OEvent Ontology Event describes a change in the ontology.
OInstanceImpl Implementation of the OInstance
OntologyEventsLog  
OntologyUtilities This class provides various Utility methods that can be used to perform some generic options.
OResourceImpl Constructor
OValueImpl Wrap either a Literal or a OResource object
OWLIMOntologyLR This LR provides an implementation of Ontology interface and uses OWLIM as a SAIL to store and interact with SESAME.
OWLIMServiceImpl Implementation of the GATE Ontology Services.
Property  
PropertyArrayResponse Special response wrapper for Property[] responses, to treat an empty response as an empty array rather than null.

Package gate.creole.ontology.owlim Description

The low-level OWLIM API for ontologies in GATE.
